vclaim: The 'Podesta e-mails' revealed the existence of a secret society of pedophiles operating through a pizza place loosely connected to Clinton associate David Brock.
title: Is Comet Ping Pong Pizzeria Home to a Child Abuse Ring Led by Hillary Clinton?
subtitle: A detailed conspiracy theory known as "Pizzagate" holds that a pedophile ring is operating out of a Clinton-linked pizzeria called Comet Ping Pong.
author: Kim LaCapria
